modShortDescription: This mod reduces the XP required to level up. It is now easier to level up. There are 3 different versions: 7000xp Version, 6000xp Version, 5000xp Version.
modDescription:
This mod reduces the [XP](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-experience/) required to level up. It is now easier to level up.

There are 3 different versions:

1. **7000xp Version**  
Reduces the XP needed to level from 10000 to 7000.
2. **6000xp Version**  
Reduces the XP needed to level from 10000 to 6000.
3. **5000xp Version**  
Reduces the XP needed to level from 10000 to 5000.

This mod is an edited version of [Slower Levelling](https://7daystodiemods.com/slower-levelling/) mod. Thanks and credits goes to JaxTeller718.

Use this on a new save and donâ€™t remove once your game is started with it.

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/qbvly77ii1953oy/Faster%20Levelling%207000xp.zip?dl=1)** 7000xp Version  
**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/om92psur5molsiw/Faster%20Levelling%206000xp.zip?dl=1)** 6000xp Version  
**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/813fipmpy3dmaxu/Faster%20Levelling%205000xp.zip?dl=1)** 5000xp Version

**Credits:** [Abasiyanik](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/abasiyanik/), JaxTeller718
